text: Gerhard Glaß (born 17 July 1927) was a German skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Possibly living people Category:German male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the United Team of Germany Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Gerhard Glaß
